Rulings.Tengu:
●Psi-Station targets the Normal Summoned Psychic-Type monster.
●After resolving Psi-Station's effect, if Psi-Station is removed from the field any monster it had affected keeps the 300 ATK increase and increased Level.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Psi-Station" targets the Normal Summoned Psychic-Type monster.\n2. After resolving the effect of "Psi-Station", if "Psi-Station" is removed from the field any monster it had affected keeps the 300 ATK increase and increased Level.
